name: Femdom Stories: Findom Simulator Sex Game
name_original: Femdom Stories: Findom Simulator Sex Game
description:
Femdom Stories: Findom Simulator Sex Game is an incremental game with a fascinating femdom-themed story shaped by the player's decisions.

Features:
■ Play the role of a Financial Dominatrix
■ Drain slaves, earn money, build your Findom Empire
■ Date Alpha guys
■ Achieve one of several different endings based on your choices
■ Steam Cloud support
